languages.text: {n}Сложив руки в аквилу, двойник произносит:{/n} "Я — ослепительный пример Человечества, несломленн{mf|ый|ая} невзгодами, отважно ступающ{mf|ий|ая} перв{mf|ым|ой} во тьме, объединяющ{mf|ий|ая} и возвращающ{mf|ий|ая} то, что было утрачено. Я — Вольный Торговец Императора".

{n}The doppelganger makes the sign of Aquila and utters,{/n} "I am a blazing paragon of Humanity, unbroken by tribulations, the first to venture into the darkness without fear and the one who unites and brings back that which was forfeited. I am a Rogue Trader of the God-Emperor."
languages.original_text: {n}Сложив руки в аквилу, двойник произносит:{/n} "Я — ослепительный пример Человечества, несломленн{mf|ый|ая} невзгодами, отважно ступающ{mf|ий|ая} перв{mf|ым|ой} во тьме, объединяющ{mf|ий|ая} и возвращающ{mf|ий|ая} то, что было утрачено. Я — Вольный Торговец Императора".

traits.locale_text: {n}The doppelganger makes the sign of Aquila and speaks:{/n} "I am a blazing paragon of Humanity, unbroken by tribulations, the first to step into the darkness without fear and the one who unites and brings back that which was taken. I am a Rogue Trader of the God-Emperor."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}Votre sosie fait le signe de l'Aquila et déclare :{/n} « Je suis un éblouissant parangon de l'humanité qui a surmonté d'innombrables épreuves la tête haute, {mf|le premier|la première} à m'aventurer dans les ténèbres sans crainte pour unir et rapporter ce qui a été perdu. Je suis {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} de l'Empereur-Dieu. »
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger makes the sign of Aquila and utters,{/n} "I am a blazing paragon of Humanity, unbroken by tribulations, the first to venture into the darkness without fear and the one who unites and brings back that which was forfeited. I am a Rogue Trader of the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre sosie fait le signe de l'Aquila et déclare :{/n} « Je suis un éblouissant parangon de l'humanité qui a surmonté d'innombrables épreuves la tête haute, {mf|le premier|la première} à m'aventurer dans les ténèbres sans crainte pour unir et rapporter ce qui a été perdu. Je suis {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} de l'Empereur-Dieu. »
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}Tu copia hace el signo del Aquila y declara:{/n} «Soy un{mf||a} ejemplar ardiente de la Humanidad, inquebrantable ante las tribulaciones. Soy {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} que se adentra en la oscuridad sin miedo, quien une y recupera lo abandonado. Soy Comerciante Independiente al servicio del Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger makes the sign of Aquila and utters,{/n} "I am a blazing paragon of Humanity, unbroken by tribulations, the first to venture into the darkness without fear and the one who unites and brings back that which was forfeited. I am a Rogue Trader of the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu copia hace el signo del Aquila y declara:{/n} «Soy un{mf||a} ejemplar ardiente de la Humanidad, inquebrantable ante las tribulaciones. Soy {mf|el|la} primer{mf|o|a} que se adentra en la oscuridad sin miedo, quien une y recupera lo abandonado. Soy Comerciante Independiente al servicio del Dios Emperador».
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}另一个复制人做了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“我是人类的光辉典范，没有任何苦难可以摧垮我的心志。我一马当先，无所畏惧地踏入黑暗之中，团结那些四分五裂的人们，夺回那些被夺走的东西。我是神皇麾下的行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger makes the sign of Aquila and utters,{/n} "I am a blazing paragon of Humanity, unbroken by tribulations, the first to venture into the darkness without fear and the one who unites and brings back that which was forfeited. I am a Rogue Trader of the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}另一个复制人做了个双头鹰手势。{/n}“我是人类的光辉典范，没有任何苦难可以摧垮我的心志。我一马当先，无所畏惧地踏入黑暗之中，团结那些四分五裂的人们，夺回那些被夺走的东西。我是神皇麾下的行商浪人。”
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}ドッペルゲンガーはアクィラの印を結び、告げた。{/n}「私は人類の燃え盛るパラゴンであり、艱難辛苦に打ち砕かれることなく、恐れることなく暗闇に飛び込む最初の者であり、失われたものを結びつけ、取り戻す者である。私こそが神帝陛下の自由開拓者なり」
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger makes the sign of Aquila and utters,{/n} "I am a blazing paragon of Humanity, unbroken by tribulations, the first to venture into the darkness without fear and the one who unites and brings back that which was forfeited. I am a Rogue Trader of the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}ドッペルゲンガーはアクィラの印を結び、告げた。{/n}「私は人類の燃え盛るパラゴンであり、艱難辛苦に打ち砕かれることなく、恐れることなく暗闇に飛び込む最初の者であり、失われたものを結びつけ、取り戻す者である。私こそが神帝陛下の自由開拓者なり」
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}{mf|Der Doppelgänger|Die Doppelgängerin} macht das Zeichen des Adlers und sagt:{/n} "Ich bin ein flammendes Beispiel der Menschlichkeit, ungebrochen von Prüfungen, der erste Mensch, der furchtlos in die Dunkelheit gezogen ist, und der Mensch, der vereint und zurückbringt, was verloren gegangen war. Ich bin ein Freihändler des Gottimperators."
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger makes the sign of Aquila and utters,{/n} "I am a blazing paragon of Humanity, unbroken by tribulations, the first to venture into the darkness without fear and the one who unites and brings back that which was forfeited. I am a Rogue Trader of the God-Emperor."

traits.locale_text: {n}{mf|Der Doppelgänger|Die Doppelgängerin} macht das Zeichen des Adlers und sagt:{/n} "Ich bin ein flammendes Beispiel der Menschlichkeit, ungebrochen von Prüfungen, der erste Mensch, der furchtlos in die Dunkelheit gezogen ist, und der Mensch, der vereint und zurückbringt, was verloren gegangen war. Ich bin ein Freihändler des Gottimperators."
traits.speaker: RTFaithFemale

languages.text: {n}Suretçalan, Çift Başlı Kartal işareti yapıp konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ben; İnsanlığın yanıp tutuşan bir emsaliyim, güçlüklere boyun eğmeyenim, karanlığa korkmadan ilerleyenim, birleştirenim ve koparılanları geri getirenim. Ben, Tanrı İmparator'un Hür Taciriyim."
languages.original_text: {n}The doppelganger makes the sign of Aquila and utters,{/n} "I am a blazing paragon of Humanity, unbroken by tribulations, the first to venture into the darkness without fear and the one who unites and brings back that which was forfeited. I am a Rogue Trader of the God-Emperor."
